verses.verse: <S%H310>After<s%> this <S%H347>Job<s%> <S%H6605>opened<s%> his <S%H6310>mouth,<s%> and <S%H7043>cursed<s%> the day of his <S%H3117>birth.<s%>
Then <S%H347>Job<s%> <S%H6030>answered<s%> and <S%H559>said:<s%>
"Let the <S%H3117>day<s%> <S%H6>perish<s%> in which I was <S%H3205>born,<s%> the <S%H3915>night<s%> which <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H1397><s%> 'There is a boy <S%H2029>conceived.<s%>'
Let that <S%H3117>day<s%> be <S%H2822>darkness.<s%> <S%H433>Don't<s%> let God from <S%H4605>above<s%> <S%H1875>seek<s%> for <S%H5105>it,<s%> neither let the light shine on <S%H3313>it.<s%>

Let <S%H2822>darkness<s%> and the shadow of <S%H6757>death<s%> <S%H1350>claim<s%> it for their <S%H6053>own.<s%> Let a cloud <S%H7931>dwell<s%> on <S%H3650>it.<s%> Let all that makes black the <S%H3117>day<s%> terrify <S%H1204>it.<s%>

As for that <S%H3915>night,<s%> let thick <S%H652>darkness<s%> <S%H3947>seize<s%> on <S%H2302>it.<s%> Let it not rejoice among the <S%H3117>days<s%> of the <S%H8141>year.<s%> Let it not <S%H935>come<s%> into the <S%H4557>number<s%> of the <S%H3391>months.<s%>
<S%H3915>Behold,<s%> let that night be <S%H1565>barren.<s%> Let no joyful <S%H7445>voice<s%> come <S%H935>therein.<s%>
Let them <S%H5344>curse<s%> it who <S%H779>curse<s%> the <S%H3117>day,<s%> who are <S%H6264>ready<s%> to rouse <S%H5782>up<s%> <S%H3882>leviathan.<s%>

Let the <S%H3556>stars<s%> of its <S%H5399>twilight<s%> be <S%H2821>dark.<s%> Let it <S%H6960>look<s%> for <S%H216>light,<s%> but have <S%H7200>none,<s%> neither let it see the <S%H6079>eyelids<s%> of the <S%H7837>morning,<s%>
because it <S%H5462>didn't<s%> shut up the <S%H1817>doors<s%> of my <S%H990>mother<s%>'s womb, nor did it <S%H5641>hide<s%> <S%H5999>trouble<s%> from my <S%H5869>eyes.<s%>
"Why <S%H4191>didn't<s%> I die from the <S%H7358>womb?<s%> Why <S%H1478>didn't<s%> I give up the spirit when my <S%H990>mother<s%> bore <S%H3318>me?<s%>
Why did the <S%H1290>knees<s%> <S%H6923>receive<s%> <S%H7699>me?<s%> Or why the breast, that I should <S%H3243>nurse?<s%>
For now should I have lain <S%H7901>down<s%> and been <S%H8252>quiet.<s%> I should have <S%H3462>slept,<s%> then I would have been at <S%H5117>rest,<s%>
with <S%H4428>kings<s%> and <S%H3289>counselors<s%> of the <S%H776>earth,<s%> who <S%H1129>built<s%> up waste places for <S%H2723>themselves;<s%>
or with <S%H8269>princes<s%> who had <S%H2091>gold,<s%> who <S%H4390>filled<s%> their <S%H1004>houses<s%> with <S%H3701>silver:<s%>
or as a <S%H2934>hidden<s%> untimely <S%H5309>birth<s%> I had not <S%H5768>been,<s%> as infants who never <S%H7200>saw<s%> <S%H216>light.<s%>
There the <S%H7563>wicked<s%> <S%H2308>cease<s%> from <S%H7267>troubling.<s%> There the <S%H3019>weary<s%> are at <S%H5117>rest.<s%>
There the <S%H615>prisoners<s%> are at <S%H7599>ease<s%> <S%H3162>together.<s%> They <S%H8085>don't<s%> hear the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of the <S%H5065>taskmaster.<s%>
The <S%H6996>small<s%> and the <S%H1419>great<s%> are <S%H5650>there.<s%> The servant is <S%H2670>free<s%> from his <S%H113>master.<s%>
"Why is <S%H216>light<s%> <S%H5414>given<s%> to him who is in <S%H6001>misery,<s%> <S%H2416>life<s%> to the <S%H4751>bitter<s%> in <S%H5315>soul,<s%>
Who <S%H2442>long<s%> for <S%H4194>death,<s%> but it <S%H2658>doesn't<s%> come; and dig for it more than for hidden <S%H4301>treasures,<s%>
who <S%H8056>rejoice<s%> <S%H1524>exceedingly,<s%> and are <S%H7797>glad,<s%> when they can <S%H4672>find<s%> the <S%H6913>grave?<s%>
Why is light given to a <S%H1397>man<s%> whose <S%H1870>way<s%> is <S%H5641>hidden,<s%> whom <S%H433>God<s%> has hedged <S%H5526>in?<s%>
For my <S%H585>sighing<s%> <S%H935>comes<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> I <S%H3899>eat.<s%> My <S%H7581>groanings<s%> are poured <S%H5413>out<s%> like <S%H4325>water.<s%>
For the thing which I <S%H6342>fear<s%> <S%H857>comes<s%> on <S%H3025>me,<s%> That which I am afraid of comes to <S%H935>me.<s%>
I am not at <S%H8252>ease,<s%> neither am I <S%H8252>quiet,<s%> neither have I <S%H8252>rest;<s%> but <S%H7267>trouble<s%> <S%H935>comes.<s%>"
